replies.author: Iridium_Ore
replies.txt_content: 卧槽 惊现Yui 我是BreakBlock

replies.author: Iridium_Ore
replies.txt_content: 点击正版页面的Profile 然后找一个Click here to change your password

replies.author: woshishui
replies.txt_content: 点击profire   第一行蓝色字  然后右上角 MYAccount  有个settings  进去之后点击 passworld 就可以了 - -{:10_512:}
